*Overview* Mirror, Mirror, On the Wall - A woman sells her soul to be beautiful, and uses her looks to get her way in life. I Want to Be a Star! - A struggling actor finds a magic genie and makes a wish, but the genie takes it too literally. Child's Play - Two children play with some boats. What could be so horrible about that? You'd be surprised... The Snake God - A man tries to oppose the voodoo snake god. What's Inside Roger? - A handsome but selfish actor meets his true self when he looks in a mirror.
